notes:
The best cards in the pack are gold cards by a pretty big margin, which puts you in a tough spot. Do you take [Forerunner of Slaughter] which is pretty good and hope you actually get to play it, or do you take [Kozilek's Sentinel] which is fine, but not great.

I think you take Forerunner, you're not going to miss the Sentinel, and if it works out you're going to be happy you've got it.
